An unofficial [_Waifu.pics_](https://waifu.pics) API wrapper for Python

## ğŸ“¦ Packages

### ğŸ PyPI

pip install nahida

## ğŸ” Examples

```py
import nahida

client = nahida.Client()

print(client.nsfw.search('neko'))

print(client.sfw.search('awoo'))
print(client.sfw.search('bite'))
```
